segments.text: I see the water from the sink is just pouring out, making a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spreading across the floor, getting closer to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is reflecting the light from the window, making little patterns.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor must be getting really slippery by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is starting to get close to the stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman's foot is already wet, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes beside her are stacked neatly, ready to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, I can't believe she hasn't noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
